interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Grim Adventures of Billy and Mandy - Billy and Mandy's Big Boogey Adventure [DVD]
Review Date: 2018/08/18
Store: Greg Eagles  (Actor),     Richard Steven Horvitz  (Actor)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Warner Home Video, All Titles
Product Description: ['Product Description', "It's Billy, Mandy and Grim versus the Boogeyman in an epic tale of monster pirates, futuristic robots, evil artifacts, and snot. When the underworld strips Grim of his powers (due to years of Billy and Mandy abusing them), Billy, Mandy, Grim and Irwin must race the Boogey Man and a crew of monster pirates to capture Horror's Hand, a powerful artifact capable of making whoever wields it into the scariest being alive.", 'Amazon.com', 'Devious characters and nightmarish happenings are the norm in the twisted, cell animated world of', 'The Grim Adventures of Billy and Mandy', "where evil clashes with evil and mean meets meaner on a daily basis. The cast of characters includes Mandy, a surly, controlling, sarcastic girl; Billy, a dim-witted, hyperactive boy obsessed with snot and other bodily fluids; Irwin, a boy who's madly in love with Mandy; the Boogeyman, a bully who's lost his ability to scare people; and the Grim Reaper, a skeletal Mr. Death who's beleaguered by the constant company of Billy and Mandy. In", "Billy and Mandy's Big Boogey Adventure", ', Billy and Mandy have recently won ownership of the Grim Reaper and their unceasing demands to accompany him as he drags unsuspecting souls to their deaths is cramping the Grim Reaper\'s style--so much so that one of his intended victims gets away. Grim is put on trial and fired from his deathly employment which leads him, Mandy, Billy, and Irwin to embark on a quest to capture Horror\'s Hand in hopes of utilizing its evil powers to get Grim\'s job back and cause widespread suffering throughout the world. The Boogeyman, Grim\'s rival since middle school, is experiencing a personal crisis because he can\'t scare modern children and is also plotting to capture Horror\'s Hand and then use it to transform himself into everyone\'s worst nightmare. Grim, Billy, Mandy, Irwin, and Boogeyman battle each other and a host of frightening monsters that include a band of pirates along the river Styx, and Billybot and Mandybot robots from the future in a fight that forces each character to face his/her own worst fears. Bonus features include the original "Bully Boogie" short which explores the middle school beginnings of the feud between Boogeyman and Grim Reaper and a "Behind the Voices" featurette with interviews with creator Maxwell Atoms, Greg Eagles (Grim), Richard Horvitz (Billy), and Grey Delisle (Mandy). (Ages 7 and older)', '--Tami Horiuchi']
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Kids & Family', 'Format': 'Animated, Color, Widescreen, NTSC, DVD, Closed-captioned', 'Contributor': 'Renee Raudman, Maxwell Atoms, Richard Steven Horvitz, Rob Desales, Greg Eagles, Dee Bradley Baker, Jane Carr, Rachael MacFarlane, Grey DeLisle, Jennifer Hale, Chris Cox, Vanessa Marshall, Phil LaMarrRenee Raudman, Maxwell Atoms, Richard Steven Horvitz, Rob Desales, Greg Eagles, Dee Bradley Baker, Jane Carr, Rachael MacFarlane, Grey DeLisle, Jennifer Hale, Chris Cox, Vanessa Marshall, Phil LaMarr  See more', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.42 x 0.58 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'Animated, Color, Widescreen, NTSC, DVD, Closed-captioned', 'Run time': '30 minutes', 'Release date': 'April 3, 2007', 'Actors': 'Greg Eagles, Richard Steven Horvitz, Grey DeLisle, Vanessa Marshall, Jennifer Hale', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish, French', 'Studio': 'Turner Home Ent', 'Writers': 'Maxwell Atoms, Rob Desales', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: Decent item, I wish that it had additional content and information.
Review Title: Nostalgia
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

['Product Description', "It's Billy, Mandy and Grim versus the Boogeyman in an epic tale of monster pirates, futuristic robots, evil artifacts, and snot. When the underworld strips Grim of his powers (due to years of Billy and Mandy abusing them), Billy, Mandy, Grim and Irwin must race the Boogey Man and a crew of monster pirates to capture Horror's Hand, a powerful artifact capable of making whoever wields it into the scariest being alive.", 'Amazon.com', 'Devious characters and nightmarish happenings are the norm in the twisted, cell animated world of', 'The Grim Adventures of Billy and Mandy', "where evil clashes with evil and mean meets meaner on a daily basis. The cast of characters includes Mandy, a surly, controlling, sarcastic girl; Billy, a dim-witted, hyperactive boy obsessed with snot and other bodily fluids; Irwin, a boy who's madly in love with Mandy; the Boogeyman, a bully who's lost his ability to scare people; and the Grim Reaper, a skeletal Mr. Death who's beleaguered by the constant company of Billy and Mandy. The Boogeyman, Grim\'s rival since middle school, is experiencing a personal crisis because he can\'t scare modern children and is also plotting to capture Horror\'s Hand and then use it to transform himself into everyone\'s worst nightmare. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** The user shows an affinity for animated content aimed at children and families, likely enjoying nostalgic series from their youth. They appreciate humor, fantasy elements, and devious characters within a playful yet dark narrative.
  
- **Content Preferences:** This user leans towards purchases of DVDs that offer unique storylines involving supernatural or horror themes, particularly with a comedic twist. They value the inclusion of bonus content and additional insights into the production and characters.

- **Rating Behavior:** A tendency to rate products in a critical manner is evident, suggesting a discerning taste. Despite a preference for animated and whimsical themes, they reflect on their purchases with a desire for depth, which indicates an expectation for more engaging content.

- **Value for Information:** The user demonstrated a desire for more comprehensive content or bonus material in their review, showcasing a preference for thorough details and behind-the-scenes perspectives.

- **Nostalgia Factor:** The theme of nostalgia is significant in their interaction, hinting at a longing for childhood favorites and a connection to specific media from their past.

Overall, this user appreciates animated family content, values additional informative features, and engages with media that evokes nostalgia while maintaining a critical approach in reviewing their purchases.
